title: Retrieve Self Employment Annual Summary
description: Retrieves a self-employment annual summary for a tax year.

includedNonTaxableProfits.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

basisAdjustment.description: If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. Between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

overlapReliefUsed.description: Overlap relief used this year. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

accountingAdjustment.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

averagingAdjustment.description: Averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works) – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative. Between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

balancingChargeBPRA.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premises Renovation Allowance has been claimed). Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

balancingChargeOther.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value). Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

goodsAndServicesOwnUse.description: Value of the normal sale price of goods or stock have been taken out of the business. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Annual investment allowance on items that qualify up to the AIA amount. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Business Premises Renovation Allowance if converting or renovating unused qualifying business premises. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceMainPool.description: Capital allowances at 18% on equipment, including cars with lower CO2 emissions. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.description: Capital allowances at 8% on equipment, including cars with higher CO2 emissions. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

enhancedCapitalAllowance.description: 100% and other enhanced capital allowances. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

allowanceOnSales.description: Allowances on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for less than their tax value). Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

capitalAllowanceSingleAssetPool.description: Capital Allowances for single asset pool costs. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

tradingAllowance.description: A tax exemption of a limited amount for individuals with trading income. Between 0 and 99999999999.99.

structureAndBuildingAllowance.description: Relief on eligible construction costs of non-residential structures and buildings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

electricChargePointAllowance.description: Expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

class4NicInfo.description: Self-employed profits above a set threshold are subject to Class 4 National Insurance charges.

exemptionCode.description:
Class 4 exemption codes - becomes mandatory if isExempt flag is set to true. Limited to the following possible values:

001 - Non Resident
002 - Trustee
003 - Diver
004 - Employed earner taxed under ITTOIA 2005
005 - Over state pension age
006 - Under 16

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
